SceneDescription.name: Library
SceneDescription.description:
Assassin: "Look. Tearing apart his mansion isn't going to make him be nice to you."
Maid: "But Head Maid Elora said that if I did this, then he would feel bad for yelling at us and apologize."
Assassin: "That's not true. He'll only be angrier. Do yourself a favor and pick up all th-"
Maid: "I don't have anywhere to go if he gets rid of me! She said it was going to be okay! What am I supposed to do now?!"
